member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.DesignerProperties
member.summary: Provides a custom implementation of DesignerProperties.GetIsInDesignMode to work around an issue.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.DesignerProperties.GetIsInDesignMode(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Returns whether the control is in design mode (running under Blend or Visual Studio).
member.param: The element from which the property value is read.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Controls.DesignerProperties._isInDesignMode
member.summary: Stores the computed InDesignMode value.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.ObjectCollection
member.summary: Implements a collection of objects.
member.remarks: ObjectCollection is intended to simplify the task of populating an ItemsSource property in XAML.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.ObjectCollection.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ObjectCollection class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.ObjectCollection.#ctor(System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ObjectCollection class.
member.param: The collection whose elements are copied to the new ObjectCollection.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.IItemContainerGenerator
member.summary: IItemContainerGenerator provides useful utilities for mapping between the items of an ItemsControl and their generated containers.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.IItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the element corresponding to the item at the given index within the ItemCollection.
member.param: The index of the desired item.
member.returns: Returns the element corresponding to the item at the given index within the ItemCollection or returns null if the item is not realized.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.IItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the container corresponding to the given item.
member.param: The item to find the container for.
member.returns: A container that corresponds to the given item. Returns null if the item does not belong to the item collection, or if a container has not been generated for it.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.IItemContainerGenerator.IndexFromContainer(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Returns the index to an item that corresponds to the specified, generated container.
member.param: The DependencyObject that corresponds to the item to the index to be returned.
member.returns: An Int32 index to an item that corresponds to the specified, generated container.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Controls.IItemContainerGenerator.ItemFromContainer(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Returns the item that corresponds to the specified, generated container.
member.param: The DependencyObject that corresponds to the item to be returned.
member.returns: The contained item, or the container if it had no associated item.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.Automation_OperationCannotBePerformed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot perform operation..

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.DateTimeTypeConverter_FormatException
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to DateTime value is in the wrong format..

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.ParameterCollection_EnsureCanChangeCollection_IsReadOnly
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ConstructorParameters cannot be changed because ObjectDataProvider is using a user-assigned ObjectInstance..

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.ResolveElementNameEventArgs_ctor_ElementNameEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The elementName should not be empty..

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.TypeConverters_Convert_CannotConvert
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' is unable to convert '{1}' to '{2}'..

member.name: P:System.Windows.Controls.Properties.Resources.TypeConverters_ConvertFrom_CannotConvertFromType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' cannot convert from '{1}'..
